performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: You had thought about the reasons for wanting to become a teacher but your presentation lacked fluency and didnâ€™t demonstrate the enthusiasm expected. Communication and presentation skills are a fundamental part of teaching and these would need to be demonstrated during interviews.
